name: Effect Spore
summary: If the user is hit with a contact move, the opponent has a 30% chance of either getting paralyzed, asleep, or poisoned. To be specific, poisoning has a 9% chance, paralyzing has a 10% chance, and sleep has 11%.
viability: Effect Spore is not too good. Any status is a good, but the issue lies in the fact that you're leaving the status up to chance. What if you wanted a specific status ailment on your opponent? All the Pok√©mon have Stun Spore, Sleep Powder, and Toxic. That alone makes Effect Spore redunant and, therefore, useless.
